definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
intolerance (for lactose, gluten or other foods)

sentences.english: Conclusions Elderly patients with chronic heart failure can tolerate carvedilol treatment.
sentences.chinese: 结论老年心力衰竭患者基本可以耐受卡维地洛治疗。

sentences.english: Reports of variation in the stool pattern with certain elements of the diet suggest dietary intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 大便形态各异伴未消化食物提示为饮食不耐受。

sentences.english: Chinese dandelion seed has certain tolerant ability to high or low germination temperature.
sentences.chinese: 种子在萌发过程中对高低温有一定的耐受能力。

sentences.english: The sensitization-homeostasis model can also explain dependence-related tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 这个致敏衡定模型也可以解释依赖相关耐受性。

sentences.english: The two kinds of IgY could resist to the enzymolysis of pepsin, but were sensitivity to the trypsin.
sentences.chinese: 两种抗体均可耐受胃蛋白酶作用，但对胰蛋白酶敏感。

sentences.english: Conclusion The tolerance of compound nitrendipine is good in healthy volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 结论健康志愿者对复方尼群地平片能较好耐受。

sentences.english: One aspect we call, called of them the virologic factors that lead to immune tolerance in vivo.
sentences.chinese: 一部分我们称之为体内导致免疫耐受发生的病毒因素。

sentences.english: To investigate the impact of megestrol on chemotherapy tolerance in patients with cancer.
sentences.chinese: 观察甲地孕酮对肿瘤患者化疗耐受性的影响。

sentences.english: Object] Studying acute toxicity and maximum tolerable dose of Astragalus composition F3 new preparation.
sentences.chinese: 究黄芪成分F3新制剂的急性毒性和最大耐受量。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the method of tolerance maintained by inducing durable and stable chimeras.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨诱导持久稳定的嵌合体来维持耐受的方法。

sentences.english: Sweden has one of the world's highest percentages of lactase tolerant people.
sentences.chinese: 其中瑞典为乳糖耐受性比例最高的国家。

sentences.english: Clonal anergy and suppressor cells are main mechanisms of the tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 克隆不应答和抑制细胞是耐受的主要机制。

sentences.english: A special case is presented by the immunoresistant Ehrlich tumor.
sentences.chinese: 一个特殊的例子是表达有免疫耐受的艾氏瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusion: One lung ventilation was well tolerated in regard to hemodynamics and blood gas analyses in piglets.
sentences.chinese: 结论幼猪可以较好地耐受单肺通气麻醉胸腔镜手术。
所有积极疗法都耐受良好。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the tolerance to carvedilol in elderly patients with chronic heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估卡维地洛治疗老年心力衰竭患者的耐受性。

definition: intolerance (for lactose, gluten or other foods)
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
